In that case, here are a few additional ingredients that can enhance the longevity-promoting properties of your new chai:

1. Schisandra Berries: These tart berries are believed to have anti-aging effects and support the body's natural defense mechanisms.
2. Astragalus Root: A traditional Chinese medicine ingredient, astragalus root is believed to enhance longevity by boosting the immune system and reducing oxidative stress.
3. Gynostemma: This adaptogenic herb is believed to enhance longevity by reducing oxidative stress, regulating blood sugar levels, and boosting energy levels.
4. He Shou Wu: Also known as fo-ti, this Chinese herb is believed to enhance longevity by promoting cardiovascular health, improving liver function, and reducing oxidative stress.
5. Licorice Root: Licorice root is believed to have anti-aging effects by reducing oxidative stress, boosting the immune system, and supporting liver health.

These ingredients can be added in small amounts to the tea, taking into consideration their flavors and effects on the overall taste and effect of the tea. It is always recommended to consult with a healthcare professional before making any significant changes to your diet or adding new ingredients.
